result.ga: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinne
result.orig: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinne
result.html: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gach éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.
result.ponchtml: Tá bua éigin ealaíne ag gaċ éinneEverybody has some artistic talent.

result.eng: His talent is that he understands people.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoine
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aige go dtuigeann sé daoineHis talent is that he understands people.

result.eng: She has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a chur
result.html: Tá sé de bhua aici ceisteanna cliste a churShe has a talent for asking clever questions.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua aici ceisteanna cliste a ċurShe has a talent for asking clever questions.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
